title: Apple Ghosts the Generative AI Revolution
description: Apple unveiled the Vision Pro headset and a number of AI-powered features yesterday, but largely ignored generative AI applications embraced by Google and Microsoft.

title: Spoutible's Low-Budget, Audacious Quest to Be the Next Twitter
description: When Elon Musk’s reign of toxic chaos began, Christopher Bouzy didn’t just go looking for a rival place to post. He joined the crowded race to create one. (It got difficult.)

title: Bankrupt Crypto Companies Are Fighting Over a Dwindling Pot of Money
description: FTX’s liquidator is trying to claw back $4 billion from the estate of Genesis Global Capital, another fallen crypto business.

title: India’s Tech Obsession May Leave Millions of Workers Without Pay
description: The Modi government is forcing low-paid workers to use a glitchy new digital registration system that fails in places with weak internet.
